review_data.title: Feine Pizza Calabrese
review_data.content: Feine Pizza, recht zentral gelegen. In der Mittagspause schnell eine Pizza essen gehen, dann auf ins Di Gioia! Schmeckt super,...More

review_data.title: Ausgezeichnetes Essen
review_data.content: Dieses Restaurant bietet hervorragendes, mediteranes Essen von Scampi, Fleischspezialitäten bis zu handgefertigter Pizza. Die Weinauswahl ist ebenso reichhaltig wie die...More

review_data.title: Superb
review_data.content: Quiet Friday evening around 7.30pm, only one other table occupied. Clean modern establishment, friendly service, spaghetti with tiger prawns was superb.

review_data.title: Nice place
review_data.content: Very nice,good italian food and the owner is very friendly. I would recommend for a quick lunch while walking in the city center

review_data.title: A night in italy
review_data.content: Wonderfull meal with ultra fresh ingredients and a great choice of red Wine by the proud italian owner. As italian as it gets!

review_data.title: Gioia e delizia per il palato
review_data.content: Ottima pasta. Sugo ai gamberoni delizioso. Roero Arneis veramente buono. Perfetta la combinazione. Ma il tocco di classe è stato...More

review_data.title: Best pasta in Zurich - so far...
review_data.content: The spaghetti Gioia that they serve are simply unbelievable in taste. I often come and eat this for a filling lunch. The owner is quite a character and if you just take him in a good funny way you can even have a laugh. If...More

review_data.title: Bad service- stay away
review_data.content: I am prepared to pay 4 francs for an espresso, however what I find totally unacceptable is the bad service and unfriendly attitude of the owner/manager. He doesn't have simple service skills, no wonder the restaurant was almost empty on a Friday night.

review_data.title: Lunch im Di Gioa
review_data.content: Das Essen schmeckt echt super! Wir habe Past mit Crevetten gehabt, war sensationell. Wenn man mit dem obersten Zampano zurecht...More

review_data.title: Na ja

review_data.title: Unfreundlicher geht es wirklich nicht!
review_data.content: Aufgrund einer Empfehlung für gutes Italienisches Essen wollte ich heute Abend das erste Mal ins Di Gioia. Der Chef begrüsste...More

review_data.title: unfreundlicher gehts nicht..
review_data.content: Das Essen ist nicht schlecht aber der Besitzer ein schleimiger und unfreundlicher Typ, geht gar nicht!

review_data.title: Das Essen ist ausgezeichnet - die Umgangsformen nicht unbedingt

review_data.title: good food
review_data.content: best pasta in zürich and had very friendly staff and everything was perfect the tables outside was awesome.

review_data.title: Mmmhh.. :)

review_data.title: Really nice Italian lunch
review_data.content: I was here with 10 colleagues for a lunch, and none of us were disappointed with the experience. We all had different pastas cooked to perfection! Most enjoyed the tagliatelle bolognese, ravioli with cream and truffle, and I was lucky to order the penne and...More

review_data.title: nicht nur herrliche Pizzas und Pasta
review_data.content: Eine gerngesehene Überraschung, die der Chef herzaubert. Nebst dem Angebot in Sachen Pizza und Pasta (welches sehr wohl auch hier...More

review_data.title: Excellent Italian food.
review_data.content: Great pasta and pizza. Some of the best Italian food we have had. Ambience of the restaurant is good, food great, service - a little over enthusiastic but passionate and keen to please, price given the quality on offer is excellent. Can highly recommend.

review_data.title: Great Italian food
review_data.content: Great food just very close to our office We're there often and it's just great italian food. The pizzas are great and the pasta is even better :)

review_data.title: Ausgezeichnete Pasta und Pizza in schöner Atmosphäre!
review_data.content: Insbesondere die vegetarischen Penne mit Brokkoli sowie die Trüffelravioli waren ein wahrer Gaumenschmaus! Sehr empfehlenswert.

review_data.title: Sehr gute Pasta nach Hausrezept
review_data.content: Das kleine Restaurant offeriert diverse, leckere Pasta und Pizzas. Der Chef "Giacomo" nimmt die Bestellung persönlich auf. Die Portionen sind...More

review_data.title: Very good pasta - annoying chef
review_data.content: We came here for lunch and I had the porcini tortellini and a salad. The food itself was actually very tasty bit the owner of the place who also served us was really annoying. When I wanted to take a pic for the review he...More

review_data.title: Very tasty pasta dish
review_data.content: The pasta dish I had was recommended by an Italian friend and proved to very enjoyable and tasty. The owner is Italian and so the restaurant can label itself as authentic Italian. This was followed by a small panna cotta and chocolate mousse, again both...More

review_data.title: Best Pasta in town...
review_data.content: Qualitätsbewusste und variantenreiche Auswahl an Pasta. Auch die Pizza's sind ausgezeichnet. Zum Café gibt's hausgemachte Desserts in angenehmer Grösse. Ausgewählte...More

review_data.title: Lousy Pizza, average pasta.
review_data.content: Went for lunch with 2 to Di Gioia. Probably the only time I’ll come there. I think it was the owner/manager who served us. He was quite pushy and impatient even though the place was half empty. The ‘Special’ pasta and pizza were of course...More

review_data.title: Basic Pizza-Pasta place with average food
review_data.content: The place was right across the street from my hotel so it was convenient to stop by here for some food. I sat down at a table and the waiter came by and asked me to move to another table because I was by myself...More
